price: Mereka berkata, "Janganlah kamu merasa takut, sesungguhnya kami memberi kabar gembira kepadamu dengan (kelahiran seorang) anak laki-laki (yang akan menjadi) orang yang alim 803".
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ
footnotes: 803.  Maksud seorang anak laki-laki yang alim ialah Isḥāq ‘Alaihissalām.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
